properties.name: razorpay.api.key
properties.description: The API key for Razorpay. Set up your environment variables with a valid Razorpay test credential: RAZORPAY_API_KEY=your_actual_test_key

properties.name: razorpay.api.secret
properties.description: The API secret for Razorpay. Set up your environment variables with a valid Razorpay test credential: RAZORPAY_API_SECRET=your_actual_test_secret
